content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_ldw

GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv_file_format

WITH (
             FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	         FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
             STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
             FIRST_ROW = 2,
             ENCODING = 'UTF8',
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE,
             PARSER_VERSION = '2.0')
)
GO

DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv_file_format;
